cards.text: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
cards.author: Kevin Kruse

cards.text: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
cards.author: Napoleon Hill

cards.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
cards.author: Albert Einstein

cards.text: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
cards.author: Robert Frost

cards.text: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
cards.author: Florence Nightingale

cards.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
cards.author: Wayne Gretzky

cards.text: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
cards.author: Michael Jordan

cards.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
cards.author: Amelia Earhart

cards.text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
cards.author: Babe Ruth

cards.text: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
cards.author: W. Clement Stone

cards.text: We must balance conspicuous consumption with conscious capitalism.
cards.author: Kevin Kruse

cards.text: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
cards.author: John Lennon

cards.text: We become what we think about.
cards.author: Earl Nightingale

cards.text: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
cards.author: Charles Swindoll

cards.text: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
cards.author: Alice Walker
